IAction.description: Union type of all possible actions that can be performed in automations
IAction.title: Action types

IAutomation.description: Defines an automation workflow with triggers and actions

actions.description: List of actions to be executed when the trigger is activated

trigger.description: The event or condition that starts the automation

IAutomation.title: Automation configuration

ICheckboxField.description: Represents a boolean checkbox field in forms and tables
ICheckboxField.title: Checkbox field

ICreateClientQontoAction.description: Creates a new client in Qonto with the specified details
ICreateClientQontoAction.title: Create Qonto Client Action

ICreatePaymentGoCardlessAction.description: Creates a new payment in GoCardless with the specified details
ICreatePaymentGoCardlessAction.title: Create GoCardless Payment Action

ICreateRecordDatabaseAction.description: Creates a new record in the specified database table with the given fields
ICreateRecordDatabaseAction.title: Create Database Record Action

IDateTimeField.description: Represents a date and time field in forms and tables
IDateTimeField.title: DateTime field

IEmailField.description: Represents an email address field in forms and tables
IEmailField.title: Email field

IField.description: Union type of all possible field types that can be used in forms and tables
IField.title: Field types

IFormulaField.description: Represents a calculated field in forms and tables
IFormulaField.title: Formula field

IGetCompanyPappersAction.description: Retrieves detailed company information from Pappers using a SIREN number
IGetCompanyPappersAction.title: Get Company Information Action

IIntegrations.description: Defines configurations for various third-party service integrations

pappers.description: Configurations for Pappers company data integration

IIntegrations.title: Integrations configuration

IListPaymentsGoCardlessAction.description: Retrieves a list of payments from GoCardless based on specified filters
IListPaymentsGoCardlessAction.title: List GoCardless Payments Action

ILongTextField.description: Represents a multi-line text field in forms and tables
ILongTextField.title: Long text field

IMultipleAttachmentField.description: Represents a field that can store multiple file attachments
IMultipleAttachmentField.title: Multiple attachment field

IMultipleLinkedRecordField.description: Represents a field that can link to multiple records from another table
IMultipleLinkedRecordField.title: Multiple linked record field

IMultipleSelectField.description: Represents a field that can store multiple selected options from a predefined list
IMultipleSelectField.title: Multiple select field

INumberField.description: Represents a numeric field in forms and tables
INumberField.title: Number field

IReadRecordDatabaseAction.description: Retrieves a record from the specified database table by its ID
IReadRecordDatabaseAction.title: Read Database Record Action

IRetrieveAttachmentQontoAction.description: Retrieves a specific attachment from Qonto using its ID
IRetrieveAttachmentQontoAction.title: Retrieve Qonto Attachment Action

IRollupField.description: Represents a field that aggregates data from linked records
IRollupField.title: Rollup field

IRunJavascriptCodeAction.description: Executes JavaScript code with optional input and environment variables
IRunJavascriptCodeAction.title: Run JavaScript Code Action

IRunTypescriptCodeAction.description: Executes TypeScript code with type checking and optional input
IRunTypescriptCodeAction.title: Run TypeScript Code Action

ISendEmailGoogleMailAction.description: Sends an email using Google Mail with specified recipients, subject, and content
ISendEmailGoogleMailAction.title: Send Email Action

ISingleAttachmentField.description: Represents a field that can store a single file attachment
ISingleAttachmentField.title: Single attachment field

ISingleLineTextField.description: Represents a single-line text field in forms and tables
ISingleLineTextField.title: Single line text field

ISingleLinkedRecordField.description: Represents a field that can link to a single record from another table
ISingleLinkedRecordField.title: Single linked record field

ISingleSelectField.description: Represents a field that can store a single selected option from a predefined list
ISingleSelectField.title: Single select field

ITable.description: Defines the structure of a database table

fields.description: Array of field definitions for the table

name.description: The unique identifier for the table

schema.description: The database schema where the table is located

ITrigger.title: Trigger types

IUpdatePageNotionAction.description: Updates the properties of a Notion page in the specified database
IUpdatePageNotionAction.title: Update Notion Page Action

IUrlField.description: Represents a URL field in forms and tables
IUrlField.title: URL field
